item.description: 循环 while # while read line ; do echo $line ; done < file.txt while read line do echo $line done < file.txt # at file.txt | while read line ; do echo $line ; done cat file.txt | while read line do echo $line done for 遍历文件中的每一行 # for line in `cat file.txt`; do echo $line; done for line in `cat /tmp/file.txt` do echo $line done 遍历当前文件夹 for i in `ls` do echo $i done 1-10 乘以4 输出 # for((i=1;i<=10;i++));do echo $(expr $i \* 4);done for((i=1; i<=10; i++)); do echo $(expr $i \* 4); done 序列输出 for i in 1 2 4 5 do echo $i; done for i in `seq 1 5` do echo $i; done 100 以内5的倍数 for i in `seq 100` do if((i%5==0)) then echo $i continue fi done Read More shell:读取文件的每一行内容并输出
